MCQ: Who coined the term machine learning in 1959?
Choices: a: Donald Hebb | b: Walter Pitts | c: Arthur Samuel | d: Warren McCulloch

MCQ: In which book did Donald Hebb introduce a theoretical neural structure?
Choices: a: The Organization of Behavior | b: Learning Machines | c: The History of Machine Learning | d: The Cognitive Process

MCQ: What was the name of the experimental 'learning machine' developed by Raytheon Company in the early 1960s?
Choices: a: Cybertron | b: Neural Network | c: Pattern Recognition | d: Artificial Intelligence

MCQ: Who proposed the early mathematical models of neural networks in machine learning?
Choices: a: Arthur Samuel | b: Donald Hebb | c: Walter Pitts | d: Warren McCulloch

MCQ: Which report in 1981 discussed teaching strategies for an artificial neural network to recognize characters?
Choices: a: Learning Machines | b: The Organization of Behavior | c: Pattern Classification | d: Artificial Neural Networks
